alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 12:28PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Greenbrier County through 100 PM EDT... At 1228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Richwood to near Babcock State Park. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quinwood... Bingham... Beartown State Park... Trout... Rorer... Leonard... and Duo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
